quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), India has launched first indigenously developed cervical cancer vaccine- “CERVAVAC”. This vaccine is developed by _________.
options: Biocon
Bharat Biotech
GlaxoSmithKline
Serum Institute of India
None of the Above

quiz.text: Who among the following is/are the beneficiaries of the above mentioned programme?
options: Researchers of Ayurveda
Companies in field of Ayurveda
MBBS Students
Students studying Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery (BAMS) course
None of the above

quiz.text: Under the above mentioned programme, a financial support of __________ will be offered for selected fellows.
options: Rs.30,000
Rs.40,000
Rs.50,000
Rs.60,000
Rs.70,000

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information shared by Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) Science & Technology, Healthcare sector in India has been expected to grow to reach a size of $50 billion by which of the following years?
options: 2023
2024
2025
2026
2027

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister for Electronics and IT has inaugurated the 2nd batch of Cytrain Setu program. This programme is offered by National e-Governance Division (NeGD) in collaboration with ___________.
options: National Law Institute University (NLIU), Bhopal
JNU
LPU
Delhi University
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Ministry of Education has been celebrating Shikshak Parv, 2022. During the celebration, it has been informed that as a follow-up of National Education Policy 2020, 4 National Curriculum Frameworks (NCF) are being developed using bottom-up approach. Which of the following is/are these NCFs?
options: NCF for School Education
NCF for Early Childhood Care & Education
NCF for Teacher Education
NCF for Adult Education
All of the Above

quiz.text: According to a recent (Sep 2022) data, System for Pensions Administration – RakSHa or SPARSH has disbursed more than Rs 3,090 Crore to Defense Pensioners digitally in August, 2022. SPARSH is an initiative launched by __________.
options: Ministry of Defence
Ministry of Home Affairs
Ministry of External Affairs
Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions
None of the Above

quiz.text: What does ‘U’ stands for in the above mentioned programme ‘SETU?
options: Understand
Underdeveloped
Upskilling
Unidirectional
None of the Above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to above mentioned programme?

A. SETU is designed to break the geographical barriers between mentors based in US that are willing to invest in entrepreneurship and sunrise startups in India.

B. The interaction will be supported through the mentorship portal under the Startup India initiative MAARG.

C.  Full form of MAARG is Mentorship, Advisory, Assistance, Resilience, and Growth.
options: a and b only
b and c only
a and c only
a, b and c
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (Sep 2022), Indian Science Technology and Engineering facilities Map (I-STEM) has launched a special drive called Women in Engineering, Science, and Technology (WEST). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to this initiative?

A. Objective of this program is to empower women with STEM background to contribute to the science, technology, and innovation ecosystem

B. I-STEM would provide a separate platform to women with STEM background to purse research in basic or applied sciences in frontier areas of science and engineering.

C. Women can pursue careers at various levels: Technicians, Technologists, Scientists and Enterpreneurs.
options: a and b only
b and c only
a and c only
a, b and c
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the information shared during recent (Sep 2022) 30th Southern Zonal Council (ZC) meeting, QR-enabled PVC Aadhar cards have been given to more than __________ fishermen.
options: 10 lakh
12 lakh
14 lakh
15 lakh
16 lakh

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Ministry of Road Transport and Highways has issued the Motor Vehicles Non Transport Vehicles Visiting India Rules, 2022. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to these rules?
options: Aim of these rules is to formalize the movement of Non-Transport (Personal) vehicles registered in other countries when entering or plying in the territory of India
These vehicles are permitted to transport local passengers and goods within the territory of India
These vehicles shall be required to comply with rules/regulations made under Motor Vehicles Act, 1988
1 & 3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Home and Cooperation Minister has announced the constitution of a National level committee for drafting of the National Cooperation Policy (NCP) document. Who among the following has been appointed as Chairman of this committee?
options: Suresh Prabhakar Prabhu
Amit Shah
NITI Aayog Vice Chairman
Piyush Goyal
None of the above

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information shared by Union Minister for Home and Cooperation while addressing a National Conference of State Cooperation Ministers, which of the following information is/are correct?
options: 51% villages and 94% farmers are associated with cooperatives in some form or the other
65,000 PACS will be computerized in the first phase for the new accounting System
Government is also going to create a National Cooperative Data Bank
Government has decided that a National Cooperative University will be formed
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), 30th Batch of Chief Information Security Officers’ (CISOs) Deep Dive Training Programme under Cyber Surakshit Bharat Initiative has been organised. Cyber Surakshit Bharat Initiative was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2013
2018
2015
2016
2017

quiz.text: According to recent (Sep 2022) data shared by Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology, on an average over __________ direct benefit transfer (DBT) payments were processed in India daily in FY 2021-22.
options: 50 lakh
60 lakh
70 lakh
80 lakh
90 lakh

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Education and Environment Minister’s meeting for G20 countries has taken place. India will assume presidency of G20 from __________.
options: 1 Dec 2022
1 Jan 2023
1 March 2023
1 Dec 2023
1 Jan 2024

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister of Commerce and Industry has attended the Indo-Pacific Economic Framework (IPEF) Ministerial meeting. Which of the following countries is not one of the members of IPEF?
options: Australia
India
Indonesia
Japan
Canada

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information shared by Union Minister for Steel during a conference, Government of India has set a target to produce __________ Ton Steel per annum up to 2030.
options: 150 Million
200 Million
250 Million
300 Million
350 Million

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), e-daakhil portal has completed two years of inception. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to this portal?
options: It simplifies filing of complaint by consumers
Consumers can file complaint in consumer commission online via the portal from anywhere
Consumer can pay the complaint fee & monitor the status of the case online.
2 and 3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information shared by Ministry of Electronics & IT, more than ___________ Aadhaar numbers have been generated (till July 2022).
options: 136.11 crores
134.11 crores
133.11 crores
132.11 crores
130.11 crores

quiz.text:
As per the above discussed guidelines, which of the following is/are eligibility criteria for Professors of Practice?

A. Experts with proven expertise of at least 20 years

B. Such experts can be from various fields like science, technology, commerce, civil services, etc

C. No formal academic qualification is required if the candidate has exemplary professional practice
options: A only
B and C
A and B
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per the above discussed guidelines, a Professor of Practice can work at an institution as a faculty for a maximum period of _________.
options: 2 years
4 years
3 years
5 years
7 years

quiz.text: As per the above discussed guidelines, number of professors of practice at an institution should not exceed ___________ of the sanctioned posts.
options: 6%
8%
12%
18%
10%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Ministry of Road, Transport & Highways (MoRTH) has issued additional safety norms for Electric Vehicle (EV) batteries which would come into effect from 1st October 2022. These norms have been recommended by an expert committee chaired by ___________.
options: Suresh Prabhakar Prabhu
Amit Shah
NITI Aayog Vice Chairman
Piyush Goyal
Tata Narsingh Rao

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Moody’s has slashed India's economic growth forecast to _________ for 2022.
options: 6.8%
7.2%
7.7%
8.2%
8.9%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Chief Economist at the State Bank of India (SBI) has lowered India’s FY23 (2022-23) growth forecast to _________.
options: 6.8%
7.2%
7.7%
8.2%
8.9%

quiz.text: According to a recent (Sep 2022) projection by International Monetary Fund (IMF), India has overtaken the United Kingdom to become the fifth-largest economy in the world. India has become a USD __________ economy.
options: 1.5 trillion
2 trillion
2.5 trillion
3.5 trillion
3 trillion

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following Indian cities have joined UNESCO (United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization) Global Network of Learning Cities to become India’s first entrants in this network?
options: Warangal
Nilambur
Thrissur
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3
